      • userLogin

        public java.lang.String userLogin(Name username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        userLogin Craft the request to login is as the specified user.
        Parameters:
        username - - the name of the user to login as
        password - - the users password
        Returns:
        String - the JSON response
        Pre-Condition:
        username not null, password not null
        Post-Condition
        catan.user cookie is set

      • userRegister

        public java.lang.String userRegister(Name username,
                            java.lang.String password)
        userRegister Craft the request to register a new user account.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user to login as
        password - the users password
        Returns:
        String - the JSON response
        Pre-Condition:
        username not null, password not null, username does not already exist
        Post-Condition
        catan.user cookie is set

      • gamesJoin

        public java.lang.String gamesJoin(int gameID,
                         CatanColor color)
        gamesJoin Join a game on the server
        Parameters:
        gameID - ID of game to join
        color - Players in game color
        Returns:
        String - JSON server response
        Pre-Condition:
        user is logged in, player currently in game or game is not full, gameID is a valid game, color is a valid color
        Post-Condition
        player is in the game with specified color, user catan.game cookie is set

      • gamesSave

        public java.lang.String gamesSave(int gameID,
                         FileName filename)
        gamesSave Save a game on the server
        Parameters:
        gameID - ID of game to join
        filename - Filename on the server
        Returns:
        String - JSON server response
        Pre-Condition:
        gameID is a valid game, filename not null or empty and valid
        Post-Condition
        game is saved on the server

      • gamesLoad

        public java.lang.String gamesLoad(FileName filename)
        gamesLoad Load a game saved on the server
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename on the server
        Returns:
        String - JSON server response
        Pre-Condition:
        filename exists on the server
        Post-Condition
        game is saved on the server

        public java.lang.String gameModel(int version)

        Parameters:
        version - Integer version of the Model
        Returns:
        String - JSON representation of client
        Pre-Condition:
        user is logged in, user has joined a game

        public java.lang.String gameReset()

        Returns:
        String - JSON representation of client
        Pre-Condition:
        user is logged in, user has joined a game
        Post-Condition
        game history has been cleared

        Pre-Condition:

      • gameCommands

        public java.lang.String gameCommands(java.util.List<Command> commands)
        gameCommands Executes specified commands on the server
        Parameters:
        commands - - list of commands to run, similar to the output of the version of this call with no parameters.
        Returns:
        String - JSON object representing updated client model
        Pre-Condition:
        user is logged in, user has joined a game
        Post-Condition
        client model has been updated

      • gameAddAI

        public java.lang.String gameAddAI(AIType aitype)
        gameAddAI Add an AI player to the current game
        Parameters:
        aitype - - the type of AI that should be added to the game
        Returns:
        String - JSON object representing response from server
        See Also:
        AIType
        Pre-Condition:
        user has logged in, user has joined a game, game is not currently full, AI type is valid
        Post-Condition
        AI player has been added to the game

      • utilChangeLogLevel

        public java.lang.String utilChangeLogLevel(LogLevel loglevel)
        utilChangeLogLevel Change the log level on the server
        Parameters:
        loglevel - new setting for logging on the server
        Returns:
        String - JSON object representing response from server
        See Also:
        LogLevel
        Pre-Condition:
        LogLevel is valid
        Post-Condition
        Server uses the new LogLevel

      • move

        public java.lang.String move(Command command)
        move perform the the specified action with the game
        Parameters:
        command - - the move to execute on the server
        Returns:
        String - JSON object representing response from server
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if move does not have a valid type
        See Also:
        Command
        Pre-Condition:
        User is logged in, User is in a game
        Post-Condition
        Move has been performed
